com.sharethrough.sdk

Class Sharethrough

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sharethrough.sdk.Sharethrough

  • public class Sharethrough
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods to handle configuration for Sharethrough's Android SDK.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Sharethrough.OnStatusChangeListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the status of having or not having ads to show changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sharethrough

        public Sharethrough(Context context,
            java.lang.String placementKey)
        Returns an instance of the Sharethrough object which is used to fetch and display native ads within your mobile app.

        A default ad cache time of 20 seconds will be used.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        placementKey - Your Sharethrough placement key that you will receive from Sharethrough.

      • Sharethrough

        public Sharethrough(Context context,
            java.lang.String placementKey,
            int adCacheTimeInMilliseconds)
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        placementKey - Your Sharethrough placement key that you will receive from Sharethrough.
        adCacheTimeInMilliseconds - The ad cache time in milliseconds. e.g. a value of 100,000 will result in ads being refreshed every 100 seconds.

      • Sharethrough

        public Sharethrough(Context context,
            java.lang.String placementKey,
            boolean dfpEnabled)
        Returns an instance of the Sharethrough object which is used to fetch and display native ads within your mobile app.

        A default ad cache time of 20 seconds will be used.

        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        placementKey - Your Sharethrough placement key that you will receive from Sharethrough.
        dfpEnabled - A boolean flag indicating if you would like to use Sharethrough's Direct Sell functionality via DFP.

      • Sharethrough

        public Sharethrough(Context context,
            java.lang.String placementKey,
            int adCacheTimeInMilliseconds,
            boolean dfpEnabled)
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        placementKey - Your Sharethrough placement key that you will receive from Sharethrough.
        adCacheTimeInMilliseconds - The ad cache time in milliseconds. e.g. a value of 100,000 will result in ads being refreshed every 100 seconds.
        dfpEnabled - A boolean flag indicating if you would like to use Sharethrough's Direct Sell functionality via DFP.

        Parameters:

                         int feedPosition)
        Parameters:
        adView - Any class that implements IAdView.
        feedPosition - The starting position in your feed where you would like your first ad.

      • getArticlesBetweenAds

        public int getArticlesBetweenAds()
        Returns:
        how many articles should be between ads. This is set on the server side.

      • getArticlesBeforeFirstAd

        public int getArticlesBeforeFirstAd()
        Returns:
        how many articles to place before the first ad.

      • fetchAdsIfReadyForMore

        public void fetchAdsIfReadyForMore()
        Fetches more ads if running low on ads.

      • isAdAtPosition

        public boolean isAdAtPosition(int position)
        Parameters:
        position - The position to check for an ad
        Returns:
        whether there is an ad to be displayed at the current position.

      • getNumberOfAdsReadyToShow

        public int getNumberOfAdsReadyToShow()
        Returns:
        the number of prefetched ads available to show.

      • getPositionsFilledByAds

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> getPositionsFilledByAds()
        Returns:
        a set containing all of the positions currently filled by ads

      • getNumberOfPlacedAds

        public int getNumberOfPlacedAds()
        Note: The max number of stored ads is set to 10. New ads stored will eject the least recently seen ad.
        Returns:
        the number of ads currently placed.

      • getNumberOfAdsBeforePosition

        public int getNumberOfAdsBeforePosition(int position)
        Parameters:
        position - the position in your feed
        Returns:
        the number of ads shown before a certain position
